Evansville.Deaconess Hospital (Evansville, Indiana): Deaconess Hospital is one of six hospitals that make up the Deaconess Health System in Southern Indiana. Deaconess Health System provides health care services to three states and 26 counties. The six hospitals include: Deaconess Midtown Hospital, Deaconess Gateway Hospital, The Women’s Hospital, The Heart Hospital, Deaconess Cross Pointe, and HealthSouth Deaconess Rehabilitation Hospital.
